name: a-moment-lost-in-time
author: piesku.com <piesku.com@gmail.com>
description: A moment lost in time. A submission for js13kGames.

scripts.prod:
rollup -c rollup-prod.js && printf "Size gzipped (including HTML): %s
" $(gzip public/index.html public/game.min.js --stdout | wc -c | awk '{print $1/1024"K"}')
